page.title: 04COMMUNITY ACTIVITIES
page.content: The{Bellingham Adult}and{Youth {Associations}are organised by the {Deputy Head Community}in the Middle School.They offer{activities}to a dozen villages and hamlets in north west Northumberland covering an area of 800 square miles. There are many things for people to do at night or weekends.Sports offered are cricket,football,badminton,tennis, and table tennis.In the evenings people can try cookery,art,keep fit, dressmaking,sailing,stick dressing, computer club,choir and History or English etc.for examinations. { Young people}can join a club in most villages or attend Young Farmers,Cubs, Scoutsand Brownies here in Bellingham. Almost the whole building is used by over 400 people attending regularly. Financially the system must cover itself causing the occasional problem.
